messages.title: MAKE THE RIGHT CHOICE!
messages.content: Maxine is naturally hardworking, fair and educated and because the youth/elderly matter make her an ideal candidate to keep her vow to fight for you, the way you want her to.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP will scrap the bedroom tax.
UKIP will support small businesses by lowering business rates.
UKIP will continue to be steadfast against HS2.
UKIP will scrap university fees for degrees in key subjects and provide more vocational qualifications.
UKIP will give local people priority for social housing.
UKIP will invest an extra £3 billion a year into the NHS. They will save money by cutting out highly paid executive staff with no medical qualifications.
UKIP will give referendums on key issues to give the power back to the people.
UKIP will invest £130 million per year to fight dementia.
UKIP will make immigration controls apply equally to all, whether those entering are from the EU or other countries.
UKIP will allow their elected MPs the freedom to represent their constituency without interference – elected UKIP MPs are the only MPs that are not party whipped.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Labour Party, The Liberal Democrats, The Green Party, The Conservative Party

issues.brexitEurope: UK Independence Party is a libertarian Party that will take Britain out of the European Union

issues.health: UKIP will invest an extra £3 billion a year into the NHS.
issues.immigration: UKIP will make immigration controls apply equally to all, whether those entering are from the EU or other countries.

housing.content: UKIP will give local people priority for social housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: Maxine is naturally hardworking, fair and educated and because the youth/elderly matter make her an ideal candidate to keep her vow to fight for you, the way you want her to.

politicalExperience.role: Care Worker, Fast Food Worker, Office Manager, Actor, Postal Worker, Fundraiser and Immigration Officer
